alert.note: Alert for Cody Foothills; Lander Foothills; Natrona County Lower Elevations; North Big Horn Basin; Northeast Johnson County; Southeast Big Horn Basin; Southeast Johnson County; Southwest Big Horn Basin; Upper Wind River Basin; Wind River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 4:12PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...Freezing Temperatures Saturday and Sunday Mornings... This is a special weather statement from the National Weather Service Office in Riverton. * WHAT...Temperatures early Saturday morning will drop below freezing, roughly between 27 and 31. Temperatures warm slightly by Sunday morning, but lows of 29 to 34 will still be common. * WHERE...Bighorn Basin, Wind River Basin, and lower elevations of Johnson and Natrona Counties. * WHEN...Saturday 2 AM Through 9 AM MDT, and Sunday 4 AM through 8 AM MDT. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...If any susceptible flowers are outside or tender vegetables have been planted in gardens, proactive measures should be taken to prevent any harm. Most vegetation of this nature is best planted outdoors after Memorial Day.
